org.ndeftools
Class Message

java.lang.Object
  java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      java.util.AbstractList<E>
          java.util.ArrayList<Record>
              org.ndeftools.Message
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable, Iterable<Record>, Collection<Record>, List<Record>, RandomAccess
public class Message
extends ArrayList<Record>

High-level representation of an NdefMessage. An NDEF message is just a list of NDEF records (with start flag in first record and stop flag in last record).

Author:
Thomas Rorvik Skjolberg (skjolber@gmail.com)
See Also:
Serialized Form

getNdefMessage

public NdefMessage getNdefMessage()
Convert record to its byte-based NdefMessage representation. At least one record needs to be present.

Returns:
record in NdefMessage form.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if zero records.
